decision_conditions: Only amendments which are subject to Schedule 17 approval are considered under this application for non-material changes to the design of the South Ruislip Vent Shaft. The amendments sought for approval relate to:
- Design and location of artificial lighting equipment.

The proposals are considered to represent an approval the authority could have given originally and are considered to be non-material. As such, the application is recommended for approval, in accordance with Schedule 17, Part 1, Paragraph 21 (Non-material changes to approvals), of the High Speed Rail (London - West Midlands) Act 2017.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission ref. 7215/APP/2020/2901, dated 03-12-2020 (Request for approval of Plans and specifications under condition imposed by Schedule 17 to the High Speed Rail (London - West Midlands) Act 2017 relating to a head house (South Ruislip Vent Shaft Head House) compound, which includes the vent shaft headhouse building, the fan room building, two ventilation stacks, road vehicle parking, an Autotransformer Station, earthworks for retaining walls and associated fencing and artificial lighting units) to amend the design of the South Ruislip Vent Shaft.
